**INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:

Before installing the game , if u had applied any previous version of the crack , then make sure to delete its registry key entries otherwise those registry key entries of the previous crack can cause Fifa 15 to crash at startup .....

 DISABLE YOUR ANTIVIRUS BEFORE RUNNING 'Setup.exe' (IMPORTANT) to avoid any error message . (For avast users: Just Disable DeepScreen in antivirus settings)...

After running setup,, click on 'Configure',, specify the install directory,, click on next and next,, select the necessary software (Direct X and Visual C++[provided in Redist folder]),, again next,, finally on 'Install' ,, after installation is completed ,, create an exception for Fifa 15 in your Antivirus (IMPORTANT) to avoid the crack being blocked and then asked for Origin to play the game,, PLAY THE GAME FROM DESKTOP SHORTCUT using run as administrator.... 

Always open the game using 'Run as administrator' to avoid any savegame/crash issue, if it still crashes, lower the graphics settings and make sure u meet the system requirements along with updated graphic drivers for your graphics card ...

You can change graphics settings from 'fifaconfig.exe' present in 'fifasetup' folder in your install directory ...

To play in full screen , just press (left) Alt + Enter at start up ....

TIPS :

If u get an error stating " Origin is not installed, and is required to play your game " or ask for an activation key , just restore the crack from the quaratine zone of your antivirus or create an exception for Fifa 15 in your antivirus before enabling your antivirus as mentioned earlier ....

Even if you meet system requirements, crack may not support your hardware configuration and therefore game may not launch. Most probably if u have older CPU's ...
